sen.j: 大学全体
sen.e: Outline of the university
Outline of the University
Outline of the University

sen.j: 1968年に現在の所在地に開設された、京都精華短期大学を前身とする4年制大学。
sen.e: Four years university founded in 1968 as founder of Kyoto Seika Junior college at present address.
sen.cmt: 「京都精華短期大学」は定訳不明
sen.e: It is a four-year university, having been founded in 1968 at its present address as the foundation of Kyoto Seika Junior College.
It is a four-year university, having been founded in 1968 at its present address as the foundation of Kyoto Seika Junior College.

sen.j: 現在は、芸術学部・デザイン学部・マンガ学部・人文学部、ならびに芸術研究科・人文学研究科の4学部・2研究科を構える。
sen.e: They currently organized four undergraduate programs, Faculty of Art, Faculty of Design, Faculty of Manga and Faculty of Humanities and two departments, art studies and literature studies.
sen.cmt: Faculty of Humanities: http://www.kyoto-seika.ac.jp/eng/4_humanities/humanities.htm 「芸術研究科」は定訳不明「人文学研究科」は定訳不明
sen.e: Currently, there are four undergraduate programs: the Faculty of Art, Faculty of Design, Faculty of Manga and Faculty of Humanities, being configured as two departments (Art Studies and Literature Studies).
Currently, there are four undergraduate programs (the Faculty of Art, Faculty of Design, Faculty of Manga and Faculty of Humanities) and two graduate programs (Art Studies and Literature Studies).
sen.cmt: 京都精華大学のHPによると、芸術研究科、人文学研究科は大学院ですので、2研究科を「two graduate programs」としました。

sen.j: 建学の精神（校訓・理念・学是）
sen.e: Split of study (school concept, philosophy, faith)
The spirit of study (school concept, philosophy, faith)
The spirit of study (school concept, philosophy, faith)

sen.j: 教育理念は、「自由自治」「国際主義」「凝集教育」「人間形成」。
sen.e: Philosophy of education is 'liberal autonomy', 'international principle', 'cohesive education' and 'foundation of human being'
The philosophies on education are 'liberal autonomy,' 'international principle,' 'cohesive education' and 'foundation of the human being.'
The philosophies on education are 'liberal autonomy,' 'international principle,' 'cohesive education' and 'foundation of the human being.'

sen.j: これらの理念は現在にも引き継がれ、例えば大学主催の学園祭「木野祭」に加え、学生主催の学園祭「五月祭」が開催されるといったかたちで実践されている。
sen.e: These philosophies are succeed from past to present, for example, the university sponsored by school festival 'Kino-sai' and students held by school festival 'Satsuki-sai'
These philosophies have been carried forth from the past to the present, as when the University sponsored the school festival 'Kino-sai' and students held the school festival 'Satsuki-sai.'
These philosophies have been carried forth from the past to the present, as when the University sponsored the school festival 'Kino-sai' and students held the school festival 'Satsuki-sai.'

sen.j: また、大学設置当初より、公式な校歌・校章・校門の類を制定・整備しないことを貫いている。
sen.e: Also since beginning of school founded, they strictly decided to not make an official school song, school badge and school gate.
Additionally, since the school's founding they have been determined not to create an official school song, school badge and school gate.
Additionally, since the school's founding they have been determined not to create an official school song, school badge and school gate.

sen.j: （ただし近年は、セキュリティ上の必要性から校門ならびにセキュリティゲートを整備している。）
sen.e: (But recently, they built school gate and security gate for security issues.)
(However, recently they built a school gate and security gate for security purposes.)
(However, recently a school gate and security gate were built for security purposes.)
sen.cmt: they' がここでは主語として不明なので、受身で自然にしました。

sen.j: 日本で初めてのマンガ学部を設置した大学として知られている。
sen.e: Known as a first university that organized Manga department in Japan.
It is known as Japan's first university to organize a department dedicated to the study of manga.
It is known as Japan's first university to organize a department dedicated to the study of manga.

sen.j: とりわけ2000年以降、文部科学省の「」として学外に設置された「」内にマンガ文化研究所を、また京都市と共同運営するかたちで「京都国際マンガミュージアム」を開設・運営するなど、文化・表現メディアとしてのマンガの研究・収集・保管・展示に力を入れている。
sen.e: After 2000, as a '' of Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology, established Manga cultural study center at outside of school and also established 'Kyoto International Manga Museum' which managed with Kyoto city for study Manga, collection, safekeeping and exhibition as a culture and expression of media.

In 2000, under the auspices of the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology, it established the Manga Cultural Study Center outside the school as well as the 'Kyoto International Manga Museum,' which is managed together with Kyoto City for the study of manga and the collection, safekeeping and exhibition as an expression of culture and media.

In 2000, under the auspices of the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology, it established the Manga Cultural Study Center outside the school as well as the 'Kyoto International Manga Museum,' which is managed together with Kyoto City for the study of manga and the collection, safekeeping and exhibition as an expression of culture and media.

sen.j: また2004年には、教育活動の発展と向上を目的に、学内に教育推進センターを設置した。
sen.e: And also in 2004, for purpose of development and improvement of activity of education, established ""in the school.
Additionally, in 2004, for purpose of developing and enhancing educational activities, ""was established in the school.
sen.cmt: IS "" SUPPOSED TO BE A STAND-IN FOR THE NAME OF A DEPARTMENT?
sen.e: Additionally, in 2004, for purpose of developing and enhancing educational activities, the Center for Enhancement of Teaching and Learning was established in the school.
sen.cmt: 「教育推進センター」(http://cetl.kyoto-seika.ac.jp/)を補いました。

sen.j: ここでは、ISO14001認証を受けているキャンパスを活用した、新しい教育システムの研究や、環境マネジメントシステム構築支援活動を通しての「自立した学習者」の育成プログラム、そのほか地元・京都の伝統産業や地場産業と連携した教育実践プログラムなどが提供されている。
sen.e: Uses the opportunity of the certificated campus by ISO 14001, bringing up 'Independent student' program through the study of new education system and supported activity of construction of environment management system, and also provided the practice educational program with cultural industry and local industry in Kyoto.

Based on the opportunity of a certificated campus by ISO 14001, it has fostered up 'independent student' program through the study of new educational systems and supporting the activities of constructing an environmental management system, and has also provided a practical educational program with the local cultural industry in Kyoto.

Based on the opportunity to achieve a certificated campus by ISO 14001, it has fostered an 'independent student' program through the study of new educational systems and support for the activities of constructing an environmental management system, and has provided a practical educational program with the local and traditional industries in Kyoto.
sen.cmt: 「伝統産業や地場産業」を「the local and traditional industries in Kyoto」にしました。

sen.j: なお、これらの活動は、複数回にわたって文部科学省の大学教育改革支援事業である「特色ある大学教育支援プログラム」に採択されている。
sen.e: And, these activities are adopted several times by 'Support Program for Distinctive University Education' which is supported activity of reforming college education by Ministry of Education.
sen.cmt: 特色ある大学教育支援プログラム: http://www.juaa.or.jp/en/support/index.html
sen.e: Moreover, these activities have often been adopted by the 'Support Program for Distinctive University Education,' which supports the Ministry of Education's activities for the reform of college education.

Moreover, these activities have often been adopted by the 'Support Program for Distinctive University Education,' which supports the Ministry of Education's activities for the reform of college education.

sen.j: 沿革
sen.e: History
History
History

sen.j: 略歴
sen.e: Brief history
Brief history
Brief history

sen.j: 1968年、形骸化した学問の自由と大学の自治の回復を目的として、故・岡本清一初代学長を中心に、現在の所在地に京都精華短期大学を開設。
sen.e: In 1968, the first president, the late, OKAMOTO Seiichi who took the lead to found Kyoto Seika junior college for the purpose of the freedom from framework study and restoration of student council.

In 1968 the first president--the late OKAMOTO Seiichi--took the lead in founding Kyoto Seika Junior College for the purpose of offering freedom from framework study and the restoration of the student council.

In 1968, the first president--the late Seiichi OKAMOTO--took the lead in founding Kyoto Seika Junior College for the purpose of offering freedom from framework study and the restoration of the student council.

sen.j: 当初は、英語英文科と美術科のみの短期大学としてのスタートであった。
sen.e: The junior college started only Department of English and Department of Art.
The junior college started only the departments of English and Art.
The junior college started only the departments of English and Art.

sen.j: 1979年、美術学部を開設。
sen.e: In 1979, faculty of art department was founded.
In 1979, the Faculty of the Department of Art was founded.
In 1979, the Faculty of Art was founded.

sen.j: 同年、短期大学美術科を廃止。
sen.e: Same year, junior college department of art was abolished.
The Junior College Department of Art was abolished in the same year.
The Junior College Department of Art was abolished in the same year.

sen.j: 10年後の1989年には人文学部を開設すると同時に、短期大学英語英文科を廃止。
sen.e: 10 years after, in 1989, faculty of literature was established and same time junior college department of English literature was abolished.
Ten years later, in 1989, the Faculty of Literature was established and the Junior College Department of English Literature was abolished.
Ten years later, in 1989, the Faculty of Literature was established and the Junior College Department of English Literature was abolished.

sen.j: 1993年には大学院を設置するなど、4年制大学としての拡充に努めている。
sen.e: In 1993, established graduate school endeavored to expand the school as four years university.
In 1993, the Graduate School was established in an effort to expand the school as a four-year university.
sen.cmt: MAYBE to expand the school beyond the context of a four-year university
sen.e: In 1993, the Graduate School was established in an effort to expand the school as a four-year university.

sen.j: 年表
sen.e: chronological table
Chronological table
Timeline

sen.j: 1968年 京都精華短期大学開設
sen.e: 1968: Kyoto Seika Junior College was established.
1968: Kyoto Seika Junior College was established.
1968: Kyoto Seika Junior College was established.

sen.j: 1979年 京都精華大学美術学部開設、短期大学美術科廃止
sen.e: 1979: Kyoto Seika University Faculty of Art was established and Junior College Department of Art was abolished.
1979: Kyoto Seika University's Faculty of Art was established, and the Junior College Department of Art was abolished.
1979: Kyoto Seika University's Faculty of Art was established, and the Junior College Department of Art was abolished.

sen.j: 1989年 京都精華大学人文学部開設、短期大学英語英文科廃止
sen.e: 1989: Kyoto Seika University Faculty of Literature was established, Junior College Department of English Literature was abolished.
1989: Kyoto Seika University's Faculty of Literature was established, and the Junior College Department of English Literature was abolished.
1989: Kyoto Seika University's Faculty of Literature was established, and the Junior College Department of English Literature was abolished.

sen.j: 2000年 芸術学部にマンガ学科、人文学部に環境社会学科を開設
sen.e: 2000: Established Manga course in Faculty of Art, and Department of Environmental and Social Studies in Faculty of Literature.
2000: The school established the manga course within the Faculty of Art as well as the Department of Environmental and Social Studies within the Faculty of Literature.
2000: The school established the manga course within the Faculty of Art as well as the Department of Environmental and Social Studies within the Faculty of Literature.

sen.j: 2001年 表現研究機構を開設、文字文明研究所・マンガ文化研究所・映像メディア研究所を置く
sen.e: 2001: Established Organization for Human Contact and opened Institute for Writing and Civilizations, Manga Culture Research Center and Research Institute of Video Media
sen.cmt: 表現研究機構: http://www.kyoto-seika.ac.jp/hyogen/文字文明研究所: http://www.jasso.go.jp/cgi-bin/user/univ_search_result.cgi?&univid=1333&prefecturename=Kyoto 「映像メディア研究所」は定訳不明
sen.e: 2001: The school established the Organization for Human Contact and opened the Institute for Writing and Civilizations as well as the Manga Culture Research Center and Research Institute of Video Media.

2001: The school established the Organization for Human Contact and opened the Institute for Writing and Civilizations as well as the Manga Culture Research Center and Research Institute of Video Media.

sen.j: 2003年 人文学部に社会メディア学科・文化表現学科を開設
sen.e: 2003: Established Department of Social and Media Studies and Department of Culture and Art Studies within Faculty of Literature
sen.cmt: 映像メディア研究所: http://www.kyoto-seika.ac.jp/eng/4_humanities/humanities.htm映像メディア研究所: http://www.kyoto-seika.ac.jp/education/humanities/cul/index.html
sen.e: 2003: It established the Department of Social and Media Studies and Department of Culture and Art Studies within Faculty of Literature
2003: It established the Department of Social and Media Studies and Department of Culture and Art Studies within Faculty of Literature

sen.j: 2004年 環境ソリューション研究機構を開設、環境ビジネス研究所・環境建築研究所・環境マネジメント研究所を置く
sen.e: 2004: Established Research Organization of Environmental Solution, and opened Environmental Business Research Center, Environmental Architecture Research Center and Environment Management Research Center
sen.cmt: 環境ソリューション研究機構: http://www.kansoken.net/環境ビジネス研究所、環境建築研究所、環境マネジメント研究所: http://www.kansoken.net/modules/english1/index.php?id=5
sen.e: 2004: It established the Research Organization of Environmental Solutions, and opened the Environmental Business Research Center, Environmental Architecture Research Center and Environmental Management Research Center

2004: It established the Research Organization of Environmental Solutions, and opened the Environmental Business Research Center, Environmental Architecture Research Center and Environmental Management Research Center

sen.j: 2006年 デザイン学部、マンガ学部を新設
sen.e: 2006: Established Faculty of Design, Faculty of Manga.
2006: The school established the Faculty of Design and the Faculty of Manga.
2006: The school established the Faculty of Design and the Faculty of Manga.

sen.j: CUMULUSとは、加盟校ネットワークを活かした共同研究や産学連携を目的に、ヨーロッパの美術・デザイン系大学が中心となって組織された、国際的な美術大学連合である。
sen.e: CUMULUS is an international art universities organization mainly from art and design universities in Europe for the purpose of the collaboration of study and industry-university cooperation by organization network.

CUMULUS is an international art university organization consisting mainly of art and design universities in Europe for the purpose of encouraging collaborative study between universities and industries.

CUMULUS is an international art university organization consisting mainly of art and design universities in Europe; its purpose is to encourage collaborative study and industry-university cooperation through means of an organizational network.
sen.cmt: 「加盟校ネットワークを活かした共同研究や産学連携を目的に」の部分を修正しました。

sen.j: 日本からは、京都精華大学が初めての加盟校となっている。
sen.e: Kyoto Seika University is the first member in Japan.
Kyoto Seika University is the first member in Japan.
Kyoto Seika University is the first member in Japan.

sen.j: 大学コンソーシアム京都に加盟。
sen.e: Member of The Consortium of Universities in Kyoto
